com.software.reuze

Interface vc_i_ColorMap

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    vc_ColorMapGrayscale, vc_ColormapLinear, vc_ColorMapSpectrum, vc_Map256, vc_Map256Gradient, vc_Map256Spline

    public interface vc_i_ColorMap
    An interface for color maps. These are passed to filters which convert gray values to colors. This is similar to the ColorModel class but works with floating point values.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getColor(float v)
      Convert a value in the range 0..1 to an RGB color.

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        int getColor(float v)
        Convert a value in the range 0..1 to an RGB color.
        Parameters:
        v - a value in the range 0..1
        Returns:
        an RGB color
